p: The amount of viral RNA was calculated from standard curves using a synthetic RNA transcript (concentrations of 10 7, 10 6, 10 5, and 10 4 copies/Î¼L). Results were normalised using amplification (qRT-PCR) of the housekeeping gene actin (as described by Piorkowski and colleagues ( Piorkowski et al. 2014)). The standard curves generated for all the YFV-specific assays had coefficients of determination values ( R 2) >0.98 and amplification efficiencies were between 93 and 100 per cent.
